snippet.title: Xuan-Yuan Sword VII: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Xuan-Yuan Sword VII: Launch Trailer 
Xuan-Yuan Sword VII is an ARPG presented in a third-person perspective. The plot is rooted in Chinese history and mythology. Players take on the role of Taishi Zhao, a calm and reliable swordsman who was involved in a tragic fate. To protect his beloved family, Taishi Zhao starts a journey in this chaotic realm to find the truth.

Xuan-Yuan Sword VII
Official Website: http://www.swd7.tw/main/index/en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/softstar.swd/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/XuanYuan_Sword
Weibo: https://www.weibo.com/softstarswd
Add to your wishlist：
Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1249800
